resources.string: The following permissions are required for this feature:
This app NEVER uses these permissions to send private data, hack you, etc.\nThe permissions are only used to provide the feature you are enabling.

This service is used for:


AppLocker

This service NEVER collects your data to hack you, etc.
It is used ONLY for the provided functions above.
The permission wasn\'t granted, try again
Select the applications to apply protection to
This app will crash by dividing by 0
Show a fake crash dialog. It should look similar to the one in the stock Android 14 ROM.
Select the apps to apply protection to.\nThe selected apps are displayed first if any.
Failed setting the password, try again
Set the password that will be used to unlock the selected apps
Set this app as the device administrator to prevent deletion and improve the security
Delete this app, remove Device Administrator
Are you sure that you want to delete this app? \nIf you have a problem, send a bug report to GitHub.\nIf you delete this app, the protection will stop working and all your settings will be deleted.

This feature requires the accessibility permission in order to work.
The permission is needed for:
- detecting when an app gets opened, and if it's in the list of selected apps, close it and show a fake crash dialog
This permission is NEVER used for anything not listed here.
You will be taken back to the app after granting this permission.
Grant the notification permission to know when an update is available
The number of failed unlock attempts needed to trigger the security
The actions that will be taken when the security is triggered

The number of failed unlock attempts before the device data is erased.\nWARNING! All your data will be lost if it isn\'t backed up. Don\'t set this setting to a low value, as you may accidentally type an incorrect password.

This feature requires the device administrator permission in order to work.
It's used for the following:
- Detect failed unlock attempts and take the required actions
- Wipe your device if there was too many failed unlock attempts (configurable)
- Disable the camera on the lock screen to prevent abuse
This app NEVER uses this permissions for anything not listed here.
An alarm sound will be played at 100% volume, and any attempts to change it will be prevented
Take a photo without the intruder knowing
A notification saying that the security was triggered.\nIt\'s recommended to disable this notification on the lock screen.
An SMS message will be sent to the selected numbers. Requires a SIM card.
The device will say \"Don\'t touch my phone!\" or something else.
Select the sound that will be played
